Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.corpus

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.corpus 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.corpus
    A package dealing with reading annotated corpora.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser) and output artefacts ( ParseConfiguration, ParseTree, and DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.corpus used by com.joliciel.talismane.corpus 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An abstract base class for annotated corpus readers, reading the various keys from the configuration.
    AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading from an annotated corpus.
    CorpusLine
    Represents one line in an annotated corpus, corresponding to a single token.
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement 
    CorpusLineReader
    A corpus reader that expects one token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction.

    The regex contains placeholders, indicated by %, the name of a CorpusLine.CorpusElement, and another %.
    CorpusRule
    A single rule used to transform the elements on a corpus line.
    CorpusSentenceRule 
    CorpusSentenceRule.Action 
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.corpus used by com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An abstract base class for annotated corpus readers, reading the various keys from the configuration.
    AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading from an annotated corpus.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.corpus used by com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An abstract base class for annotated corpus readers, reading the various keys from the configuration.
    AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading from an annotated corpus.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.corpus used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An abstract base class for annotated corpus readers, reading the various keys from the configuration.
    AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading from an annotated corpus.
    CorpusLine
    Represents one line in an annotated corpus, corresponding to a single token.
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement 
    TokenPerLineCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.corpus used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
